about_the_game:
Dive into the merciless wilderness of Sweden, where the boundaries between human and beast blur. In this survival sandbox game, endless possibilities and an open world full of realism and dangers await you. Utilize your skills and instincts to battle against the harsh environment and master the challenges of survival.

Be warned: You are not alone. In the impenetrable forests, werewolves lurk, half-human, half-beast, ready to devour any intruder. Explore the landscape, take refuge in abandoned places to call your new home, gather resources, and fight for your survival against the brutal attacks of these mystical creatures.

Prove your survival skills with a variety of realistic weapons, ranging from traditional military arms to improvised combat devices. Use everything at your disposal to withstand the adversities of this harsh world and fulfill your destiny.

Only those with the strength, skill, and determination will succeed in surviving in this wilderness. However, the danger doesn't only lie in the wilderness, but also in the deep caves used as shelters by the werewolves. Destroy their caves to weaken their population and increase your chances of survival.

content_descriptors.notes: Project Werewolf contains violence, blood and gore, as well as horror themes and occasional drug abuse

short_description: Enter a world full of mystical dangers in the merciless northern Sweden. Uncover the dark secrets of the werewolves as you fight for survival in a relentless open world. Will you solve the puzzle of the beasts and conquer them?
